content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide detailed instructions.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 3 layers of yellow horizontal bars
- Between these bars are two identical patterns rotated/mirrored:
  * Each pattern consists of a red cube, blue cube, and green vertical block
- Total block count: 9 blocks (3 yellow bars, 2 red cubes, 2 blue cubes, 2 green vertical blocks)

Block Selection from Dictionary:
- Yellow horizontal bars: blocks #11 or #12
- Red cubes: block #3
- Blue cubes: block #1
- Green vertical blocks: block #7 or #8

Assembly Order (from bottom to top):
{
Step1: Move block with index 11 (bottom yellow bar)
Step2: Move block with index 7 (left green vertical block)
Step3: Move block with index 3 (left bottom red cube)
Step4: Move block with index 1 (left top blue cube)
Step5: Move block with index 11 (middle yellow bar)
Step6: Move block with index 7 (right green vertical block)
Step7: Move block with index 3 (right bottom red cube)
Step8: Move block with index 1 (right top blue cube)
Step9: Move block with index 11 (top yellow bar)
}

This assembly sequence will create a symmetrical structure that matches the target image exactly.
